marketsDescription: Saffary has rapidly grown to become a leading online FoodTech platform with operations in various cities in Bahrain.
saffaryDescription: Saffary is one of Bahrain's leading FoodTech Platform for Hyperlocal Market.
saffaryDetails: Saffary is an innovative solution for anyone who wants to have coffee, snacks & instant bites/meals from nearby merchants. Through Saffary App, anyone can access a list of items provided by nearby merchants who have partnered with Saffary and can easily place an order with 3 simple & easy steps.
conceptValidation: Our concept has been validated, and we are already generating significant traction at our pilot site, which is in the capital governorate, Manama. Our aim is to expand this model to all such places in Bahrain at the kick start.
storyContent1: In 2020, our founder had an accident with a local coffee shop vendor because he couldn't deliver tea and drinks to our office on time. That same day, the founder asked the vendor about his issues and decided to build a technology-based platform for him so he could manage his deliveries seamlessly
storyContent2: As soon as Saeed started to develop the plan, the COVID-19 pandemic hit the global market and almost all offices closed. But the café problem was so real that Saeed started working on its planning even during the COVID times.
storyContent3: Saeed wanted to choose a simple and memorable brand name, and one day he came across a very popular word in the times of Covid 'Corona', hence he planned to name this product 'Saffari' and gave the slogan 'Saffari, ask for Safari to take it!'
storyContent4: When Saeed was working on this product, he realized that this is a common problem for everyone who goes to the office daily, and if they want to order anything with their tea/coffee, they have no choice but to call local merchants and ask for the product to be delivered to their offices
storyContent5: Given all these factors, we decided to focus on instant food delivery with tea and coffee.
storyContent6: In December 2021, most of the offices were up and running, and we were also ready with the initial version of the mobile app. We started reaching out to local merchants to onboard them to our platform. Unfortunately, given the new concept, no merchants showed interest in our product, and we weren't able to onboard any until mid-February 2022.
registerDescription: Register yourself on the Saffary app and choose your location by enabling location permission or by choosing manual.
findNearbyMerchantDescription: If any merchant is associated with us, they will be listed under 'Nearby Merchant'.
provideDeliveryAddressDescription: On the cart page, you will be asked to enter your delivery address. Verified addresses can place orders without validation.
orderDetailsTrackDescription: All order details will be shown under the 'History' tab. You can also track your orders or seek help through the provided options.
digitalAccountDescription: Under the Account section, you can see month-wise pending dues from your merchants and track the status of payments.
